description: Application to vary Condition 2 of planning permission 2021/1465 (Approved Drawings) to "Improve the arrangement of the fenestration on the north and south facades and for skylights to suit internal arrangements".
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">The development
hereby permitted shall begin no later than 12<sup>th</sup> January 2025 (three
years from the date of appeal decision APP/U5360/D/21/3282584 relating to approved
application ref; 2021/1465).<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;</span></p><p>



</p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">REASON: In
order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
(as amended).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">The development
hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved
plans:&nbsp; X-000-x-xxx | Site Location
Plan;&nbsp; P-200-rev01 (Sept 2024) | Proposed
North Elevation;&nbsp; P-201-rev01 (Sept 2024)
| Proposed South Elevation;&nbsp; Design and
Access Statement.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">&nbsp;</span></p><p>



</p><p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">REASON: To
ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance
with the plans hereby approved.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p>Within three months of the date of this permission, details of additional bird boxes to be added to the building/site, their proposed location (below eaves level with clear flight path), and a timetable for their installation shall be submitted to the local planning authority for approval in writing.&nbsp; The installation shall subsequently be carried out in accordance with the approved details and timetable and the nest boxes shall thereafter be retained.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p> </p><p>REASON:&nbsp; In the interests of biodiversity net gain.</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
